The photo was shared on Facebook on Nove: 2020, depicting a devastated landscape in Guinobatan, Albay, after Typhoon Goni.
The caption of the photo mentioned: Aftermath Super Typhoon Rolly / Guinobatan, Albay," with "Rolly" being the local name for Typhoon Goni.
A reverse image search on Google reveale: 2013, as part of a slideshow titled "Tacloban in ruins," showcasing the aftermath of Typhoon Haiyan.
